from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()

storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

import json

path_to_file = "abfss://odw-config@"+storage_account+"orchestration/orchestration.json"
df = spark.read.option("multiline","true").json(path_to_file)

definitions = json.loads(df.toJSON().first())['definitions']
definition = next(d for d in definitions if d['Standardised_Table_Name'] == table_name)

latest_folder_date = get_latest_date_folder(definition)

definition['ingestion_day'] = latest_folder_date.day
definition['ingestion_month'] = latest_folder_date.month
definition['ingestion_year'] = latest_folder_date.year

mssparkutils.notebook.exit(definition)
